briefTitle: A Prospective Cohort Study of Occupational Exposures and Cancer Risk Among Women
officialTitle: A Prospective Cohort Study of Occupational Exposures and Cancer Risk Among Women
conditions: Lung Cancer, Non-Hodgkin Lymphoma, Breast Cancer, Stomach Cancer, Brain Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
* INCLUSION CRITERIA:

Women aged 40-69 who are permanent residents in eight geographically defined communities of urban Shanghai.
